TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HtmlDocument extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供最上層的程式存取方式，以存取 控制項所裝載的 HTML 文件。

span.span: Provides top-level programmatic access to an HTML document hosted by the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 提供 Internet Explorer 的文件物件，也就是 HTML 文件物件模型 (DOM) 的 managed 包裝函式。 provides a managed wrapper around Internet Explorer's document object, also known as the HTML Document Object Model (DOM). 取得的執行個體經由屬性控制項。You obtain an instance of through the property of the control. 在 HTML 文件內的 HTML 標記可以是巢狀內嵌於另一個。HTML tags inside of an HTML document can be nested inside one another. 因此表示文件樹狀目錄中，其子系都是執行個體的類別。 thus represents a document tree, whose children are instances of the class. 下列程式碼範例顯示簡單的 HTML 檔案。The following code example shows a simple HTML file. ```
Simple HTML Form
Enter Your Name:
``` 在此範例中，代表整個文件內`HTML`標記。In this example, represents the entire document inside the `HTML` tags. `BODY`， `DIV`，`FORM`並`SPAN`標記都由個別物件。The `BODY`, `DIV`, `FORM` and `SPAN` tags are represented by individual objects. 有數種方式，您可以存取此樹狀結構中的項目。There are several ways you can access the elements in this tree. 使用屬性來存取`BODY`標記和所有子系。Use the property to access the `BODY` tag and all of its children. 屬性可讓您的 HTML 頁面，其中包含使用者輸入的焦點的項目。The property gives you the for the element on an HTML page that has user input focus. HTML 網頁中的所有項目可以有一個的名稱;集合提供給每個存取做為索引中使用它的名稱。All elements within an HTML page can have a name; the collection provides access to each using its name as an index. 會傳回的所有物件與指定的 HTML 標記名稱，例如`DIV`或`TABLE`。 will return an of all objects with a given HTML tag name, such as `DIV` or `TABLE`. 會傳回單一對應至您提供的唯一識別碼。 will return the single corresponding to the unique ID that you supply. 會傳回可找到螢幕上同時提供的滑鼠指標的座標。 will return the that can be found on the screen at the supplied mouse pointer coordinates. 您也可以使用和集合來逐一查看項目代表使用者可輸入表單和圖形，分別。You can also use the and collection to iterate through elements that represent user input forms and graphics, respectively. 藉由將 Internet Explorer 的 DHTML DOM 的 unmanaged 介面為基礎： `IHTMLDocument`， `IHTMLDocument2`， `IHTMLDocument3`，和`IHTMLDocument4`。 is based on the unmanaged interfaces implemented by Internet Explorer's DHTML DOM: `IHTMLDocument`, `IHTMLDocument2`, `IHTMLDocument3`, and `IHTMLDocument4`. 只有最常使用的屬性，而且這些未受管理的介面上的方法由。Only the most frequently used properties and methods on these unmanaged interfaces are exposed by . 您可以存取所有其他屬性和方法，直接使用屬性，您可以將它轉換成所需的 unmanaged 的介面指標。You can access all other properties and methods directly using the property, which you can cast to the desired unmanaged interface pointer. HTML 文件可能包含不同的視窗的框架內控制項。An HTML document may contain frames, which are different windows inside of the control. 每個畫面格會顯示其自己的 HTML 頁面。Each frame displays its own HTML page. 集合是可透過屬性。The collection is available through the property. 您也可以使用屬性，以調整顯示的頁面大小、 捲動文件，或是顯示警示，並提示使用者。You may also use the property to resize the displayed page, scroll the document, or display alerts and prompts to the user. 會公開您預期要處理裝載的 HTML 網頁時最常見的事件。 exposes the most common events you would expect to handle when hosting HTML pages. 不直接介面所公開的事件，您可以加入使用事件處理常式。For events not exposed directly by the interface, you can add a handler for the event using . HTML 檔可能包含`SCRIPT`封裝寫入其中一個作用中的指令碼語言，例如 JScript 或 VBScript 中的程式碼的標記。HTML files may contain `SCRIPT` tags that encapsulate code written in one of the Active Scripting languages, such as JScript or VBScript. 方法會提供執行屬性和方法中定義`SCRIPT`標記。The method provides for execution of properties and methods defined in a `SCRIPT` tag. > [!NOTE] > 當您於大部分屬性、 方法和事件有保留相同的名稱，因為它們對未受管理的 DOM，某些已變更的一致性與[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。While most of the properties, methods, and events on have kept the same names as they have on the unmanaged DOM, some have been changed for consistency with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用 Northwind 資料庫中的資料建立`HTML TABLE`動態使用。The following code example uses data from the Northwind database to create an `HTML TABLE` dynamically using . 也會使用方法，先將資料格 (`TD`項目) 的資料列 (`TR`項目)，然後將資料列加入資料表中，最後，將資料表新增至目前的文件的結尾。The method is also used, first to add cells (`TD` elements) to rows (`TR` elements), then to add rows to the table, and finally to append the table to the end of the current document. 程式碼範例需要您的應用程式已控制項，名為`WebBrowser1`。The code example requires that your application has a control named `WebBrowser1`. 已載入文件後，就應該呼叫程式碼。The code should be called after a document has been loaded. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument/CS/Form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument/VB/Form1.vb#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者按一下它時，連結是作用中。A link is active when a user is clicking on it. 變更此屬性以變更之前瀏覽連結的色彩。Change this property to change the color of the link prior to navigation. 中輸入[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]支援`Alpha`值，但是 HTML DOM 則否。The type in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] supports an `Alpha` value, but the HTML DOM does not. 因此，`Alpha`不會影響指派給這個屬性時。Therefore, `Alpha` will have no effect when assigned to this property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合提供隨機存取任何項目在 HTML 文件，不論其文件樹狀結構中的位置。The collection provides random access to any element in the HTML document, regardless of its position in the document tree. 您可以使用它來存取名稱、 識別碼、 HTML 文件中的任何項目或索引。Use it to access any element in an HTML document by name, ID, or index. 您也可能會逐一查看所有文件中的項目。You may also iterate over all of the elements within a document. 某些項目，例如`HEAD`和`TITLE`，絕對不會有與其相關聯的名稱。Some elements, such as `HEAD` and `TITLE`, will never have names associated with them. 所有其他項目在 HTML 檔案的作者指派時，才會有名稱。All other elements will have names only if the author of the HTML file assigned them. 您可以存取項目沒有依識別碼或索引的名稱。You can access elements without names by ID or index. 您無法直接加入項目集合，因為所有的項目在 HTML 檔案外部的`HTML`標記必須有父項目。You cannot add elements directly to the collection, because all elements in an HTML file outside of the `HTML` tag must have a parent element. 使用方法或屬性上的樹狀結構中加入新項目。Use the method or the property on to add new elements to the tree. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例逐一查看所有文件和集合中的項目`Enabled=True`，讓可能已停用預設文件在載入時，防止使用者輸入的任何項目。The following code example iterates through all of the elements in a document and sets `Enabled=True`, enabling any elements that may have been disabled by default to prevent user input while the document was loading. 程式碼範例需要您的應用程式含有控制項，名為`WebBrowser1`。The code example requires that your application contains a control named `WebBrowser1`. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您不應該附加至文件或其中一個物件的事件，直到文件已完成載入。You should not attach an event to the document or one of its objects until the document has completed loading. 您應該呼叫這個方法最舊的處於事件的控制項。The earliest you should call this method is in the event of the control. 這個方法可讓您將處理常式附加至未受管理的 DOM 事件不公開。This method allows you to attach handlers to unmanaged DOM events not exposed by . 如需使用未受管理的 DOM 事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[存取 Managed HTML 文件物件模型上的未公開成員](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/accessing-unexposed-members-on-the-managed-html-document-object-model.md)IHTMLDocument 介面： [IHTMLDocument](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104882)， [IHTMLDocument2](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104884)， [IHTMLDocument3](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104886)， [IHTMLDocument4](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104887)， [IHTMLDocument5](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104888)。For more information about available unmanaged DOM events, see [Accessing Unexposed Members on the Managed HTML Document Object Model](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/accessing-unexposed-members-on-the-managed-html-document-object-model.md) and the IHTMLDocument interfaces: [IHTMLDocument](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104882), [IHTMLDocument2](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104884), [IHTMLDocument3](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104886), [IHTMLDocument4](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104887), [IHTMLDocument5](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104888).

remarks.format: ## Remarks HTML 文件分割成兩個主要章節：An HTML document is split into two major sections: - `HEAD`其中包含文件的標題，任何文件中繼資料，以及`SCRIPT`項目。`HEAD`, which contains the document's title, any document meta-data, and `SCRIPT` elements. - `BODY`其中包含有關中的項目中的所有螢幕上的文件的外觀。`BODY`, which contains all of the elements involved in the on-screen appearance of the document. 沒有對等`Head`屬性上的。There is no equivalent `Head` property on . 若要取得`HEAD`項目，使用。To obtain the `HEAD` element, use . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立新`DIV`項目並將其附加至文件使用的底部方法。The following code example creates a new `DIV` element and appends it to the bottom of the document using the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，如果您以滑鼠右鍵按一下您的文件或文件中的項目上的滑鼠它會顯示預設內容功能表特定的項目。By default, if you right-click your mouse on a document or an element in a document, it will display a default context menu particular to the element. 使用此事件可取消的操作功能表顯示並顯示您自己的其中一個。Use this event to cancel the display of the context menu and display one of your own. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會擷取事件並使用它來顯示。The following code example captures the event and uses it to display a . summary.span: 取得或設定與這份文件相關的 HTTP Cookie。

span.span: Gets or sets the HTTP cookies associated with this document.

value.span: 包含 Cookie 清單的 ，以分號將每個 Cookie 分隔。

span.span: A containing a list of cookies, with each cookie separated by a semicolon.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性公開為 Web 網頁的所有 cookie。The property of exposes all cookies set for a Web page. A *cookie*是給定的 Web 網頁相關聯的任意名稱/值組。A *cookie* is an arbitrary name/value pair associated with a given Web page. Web 開發人員會使用 cookie 來追蹤使用者瀏覽，或返回網站時。Web developers use cookies to track when users visit or return to a Web site. Cookie 是由多個部分，稱為 cookie 連結，可決定以下各項組成：A cookie is composed of multiple parts, called cookie crumbs, that determine the following: - 設定 cookie 套用至的文件;它的網域和路徑。The document set to which the cookie applies; its domain and path. - 名稱和值的 cookie。The name and value of the cookie. - Cookie 的到期日。The expiration date of the cookie. - 是否 cookie 只能傳送使用安全連線。Whether the cookie can only be sent using a secure connection. 屬性可能包含多個 cookie。The property may contain multiple cookies. 您只能使用一次設定一個 cookie 的屬性。You can only use the property to set one cookie at a time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，兩個不同的框架中的網頁無法存取彼此的內容使用指令碼;即使 www.microsoft.com 和 msdn.microsoft.com，在此情況下，被視為不同的網域。By default, two Web pages in different frames are prevented from accessing each other's content using script; even www.microsoft.com and msdn.microsoft.com are, in this instance, considered different domains. 若要啟用跨框架指令碼相同的最上層網域的頁面，您可以指派新值以屬性。To enable cross-frame scripting for pages from the same top-level domain, you can assign a new value to the property. 在舊的 URL 範例，設定microsoft.com 可讓這兩個頁面與彼此進行通訊。In the pervious URL example, setting to microsoft.com would allow both pages to communicate with one another. 指派給字串屬性必須是有效的最上層網域。Strings assigned to the property must be valid top-level domains. 在上述的 URL 範例中，您可以設定microsoft.com，但不是屬於.com，這會啟用編寫指令碼頁面的內容在網際網路上任何頁面。In the previous URL example, you can set to microsoft.com, but not to .com, which would enable any page on the Internet to script a page's contents. 您無法使用屬性，來啟用跨框架指令碼使用兩個不同的通訊協定存取的頁面。You cannot use the property to enable cross-frame scripting for pages accessed using two different protocols. 如果您的頁面中的一個框架來自 Web 伺服器 （http:// 通訊協定），另一個來自檔案系統 (file://) 通訊協定，它們將無法彼此進行通訊的值為何屬性。If one frame in your page comes from a Web server (the http:// protocol) and another comes from the file system (the file://) protocol, they will not be able to communicate with one another regardless of the value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所傳回之物件的基礎型別而異。The underlying type of the object returned by will vary. 如果呼叫的 Active Scripting 函式會傳回純量的資料，例如字串或整數，它會以字串傳回。If the called Active Scripting function returns scalar data, such as a string or an integer, it will be returned as a string. 如果它傳回指令碼為基礎物件，例如使用 JScript 或 VBScript 的建立的物件`new`運算子，其將會是型別`Object`。If it returns a script-based object, such as an object created using JScript or VBScript's `new` operator, it will be of type `Object`. (您可以在這類物件上進行呼叫，藉由呼叫並使用。)如果它傳回的 HTML DOM 項目，例如`DIV`或是`TABLE`，其將會是型別`Object`; 如果您已新增 MSHTML 的專案參考。DLL，不過，它會轉換成其特定的非受控 DOM 型別。(You can make calls on such objects by calling and using .) If it returns an HTML DOM element, such as a `DIV` or a `TABLE`, it will be of type `Object`; if you have added a project reference to MSHTML.DLL, however, it will be cast to its specific unmanaged DOM type. 您可能會呼叫使用者的電腦，包括 JScript 和 VBScript 上安裝任何 Active Scripting 語言撰寫的任何函式。You may call any function written in any Active Scripting language installed on the user's machine, including JScript and VBScript. 這個方法會進行 nothing 如果使用者已明確關閉 Internet Explorer 中的指令碼執行時，才，或網頁的目前安全性組態不允許使用它。This method will do nothing if the user has explicitly turned off script execution in Internet Explorer, or if the current security configuration for the Web page does not allow it. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會執行指令碼的內容，在網頁中。The following code example executes the contents of a script in a Web page. 在程式碼範例，您需要呼叫的應用程式中`WebBrowser1`，和您所載入的下列網頁。The code example requires that you have a in your application called `WebBrowser1`, and that you have loaded the following Web page. ``` ``` [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument/CS/Form1.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument/VB/Form1.vb#9)]
